GSEAdv: A package for analyzing gene sets.

Source: R/GSEAdv-package.R
GSEAdv.Rd

The GSEAdv package provides methods enhancing the GSEABase package. Mainly it address thre points related to GeneSetCollections, describe, analyze, and simulate them. Each one has a specific vignette.

GSEAdv methods

There are several new methods for GeneSetCollections

  • summary: Some statistics of the GeneSetCollection.

  • genesPerPathway: The number of genes each gene set has.

  • pathwaysPerGene: The number of gene sets each gene has.

  • pathway: Information about a gene set.

  • gene: Information about a gene.

  • condPerGenes: The conditional probability of the length of a pathway given the numer of gene sets a gene is in.

  • condPerPathways: The conditional probability of the numer of gene sets a gene is in given the length of a gene set.

  • sizePathways

  • sizeGenes
